message.body: Have you heard of GeoGuessr? I'm completely addicted.
I have not heard of that. What is it?
Its an internet game where it drops you in a random place in google maps street view and you try to figure out where you are by wandering around

Also, only our Mom--I bring up that I want a photobooth at the wedding, like a real booth not just a sheet set up with a camera, and her first comment is wondering if people are going to have sex in the booth during the wedding
I mean...maybe? But probably not who would do that
I mean, that never crossed my mind until she brought it up
What kind of people does she think are coming to this wedding?
I mean that's like asking if people will have sex in the bathrooms
Sure they could but it seems unlikely
Oh hey guess what I have a phone convo with a google recruiter tomorrow
